page.para: One day, Mouse found a big cake. “I will take this cake home,” he said.
Mouse be/gan to push the cake. But the big cake did not move!
Mouse tried to pull the cake. But the big cake did not move!
Mouse pushed the cake from the oth/er side. But still, the cake didn’t move!
Mouse tied a string a/round the cake. He would pull the cake to his house.
Mouse pulled the string hard. But still the cake didn’t move!
Mouse had an i/de/a. He would nib/ble the edges of the cake!
The cake soon dis/ap/peared! Mouse need/ed to lie down!
But now Mouse could not get in/to his house! Greed/y Mouse.
